txt.en: You have encountered the Warband-leader Arataus and his band of riders
Arataus and his band of riders helped to loot and burn the farms of the Fallows. Their reign of terror must be stopped.
Arataus and his band of riders helped to loot and burn the farms of the Fallows. Their reign of terror must be stopped.
Arataus and his band of riders roam the plains on the eastern side of the Fallows.
The Fallows farmland is safer now that Arataus has been taken care of, thanks to you. The people of Forlaw appreciate your efforts.
Arataus and his band of riders roam the plains on the eastern side of the Fallows.
